channel.title: iMed Lab - Blog
channel.description: A research lab at the University of Pittsburgh headed by Dr. Ervin Sejdic. The mission of the lab is to develop clinically relevant solutions by fostering innovation in computational approaches and instrumentation that can be translated to bedside care.

item.title: A paper accepted for publication in Sensors
item.description: "Adaptive transcutaneous power transfer to implantable devices: A state of the art review" co-authored by K. Bocan, E. Sejdić was published in Sensors.

item.title: Dr. Sejdić received the Presidential Early Career Award for Scientists and Engineers
item.description: President Obama named Dr. Sejdić as a recipient of the Presidential Early Career Award for Scientists and Engineers, "...the highest honor bestowed by the United States Government on science and engineering professionals in the early stages of their independent research careers..."
